classes.base: w-full mx-4 max-w-[344px] rounded-lg md:max-w-[480px] shadow-1 modal-dialog-content js-content-modal-dialog active
header relative flex items-center justify-between rounded bg-brand-marine px-4 py-3 lg:mb-4 lg:px-0 lg:py-0 lg:bg-transparent
account-order-details-inner border-b border-default last:border-transparent grid gap-4 lg:table-row-group

lg:py-4 flex lg:table-cell text-sm text-grey-700 tracking-default before:content-[attr(data-label)] before:block before:w-[120px] before:text-grey-900 before:text-sm before:font-bold before:mr-6 lg:before:hidden
account-order-details-inner border-b border-default last:border-transparent grid gap-4 lg:table-row-group
py-4 bg-brand-marine text-left text-sm text-white font-bold tracking-default
p-4 lg:p-0 grid gap-y-1 lg:gap-y-0 lg:table-row

as.h1: text-xl font-medium tracking-normal text-white lg:text-grey-900 lg:text-2xl
as.h2: text-lg font-medium tracking-normal text-white lg:text-grey-900 lg:text-xl
